clause_text: At junctions of roads meeting at right angles, the rounding off at the intersection shall be done with the tangent length from the point of intersection to the curve being half the road width across the direction of tangent as shown in Fig.3A. The building shall also set back at required marginal distance from this rounding off. Fig.3A - Rounding off at junctions of right angled intersections Fig.3B - Rounding off at junctions at acute / obtuse intersections.
